choices.E: The data source configuration does not need to be updated when new nodes are added to the RAC cluster
choices.B: The more sophisticated runtime connection load balancing (RLCB) is used; without SCAN, load balancing reverts to a simple round-robin scheme
choices.C: SCAN is required for the GridLink data source to use an XA driver
choices.A: The Fast Connection Failover (FCF) pattern, which allows rapid failure detection, is enabled
choices.D: The database URL is shorter because it contains one SCAN alias and port as opposed to a host and port for each RAC node

questions.question_text: Identify two advantages of using a Single Client Access Name (SCAN) when configuring a GridLink data source. (Choose two.)

choices.C: Have Node Manager start at system boot as a daemon
choices.B: Use the administration console. Select the machine and then click the Start button.
choices.E: Set the appropriate environment variables. Then run the Java virtual machine with the class nodemanager.RunTime, passing the class the proper parameters.
choices.D: Use the Oracle Process Manager and Notification Server (OPMN) to start Node Manager as a system process

questions.question_text: Select two ways to start the Java-based Node Manager on a Linux machine. (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
Don't have button to starting nodemanager on console, the right answer is A and C
I believe is A and C as well, if node manager is not running if you go to Admin Console nothing will happen with the managed servers.

Sure A,C is the right answer.

B is wrong.

En la pregunta 2 es: 
B. Use a single machine.
D. Use all machines in the domain.
F. Use all machines whose names match an expression.

En la pregunta 7 es:
A. Use a single machine.
C. Use all machines in the domain.
E. Use all machines whose names match an expression.

En la pregunta 126 es:
B. Use machines whose names match an expression
D. Use all machines in a subnet
E. Use a single machine

En la pregunta 126 es:
B. Use a single machine.
D. Use all machines in the domain.
F. Use all machines whose names match an expression.

questions.question_text: When creating a dynamic cluster, you have multiple options concerning how dynamic servers are. Which of the following are valid options?

choices.C: Use all machines in a subnet.
choices.D: Use all machines in the domain.
choices.E: Use all percentage of machines in the domain.
choices.F: Use all machines whose names match an expression.
